TopicTitle: Tap Tap (Is this mic even on?)

Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow lovers of scraping down a runway while being upside down and on fire!

I'm former Air Force, former game designer, former IT management and current author. I can't answer too many questions as the Witness Protection folks get real mad at me when I say too much publicly.

Just want to say "Hi." Thanks for all the help on the noob questions so far and I hope to get up to speed (that was a joke, get it? ) as soon as possible.

That's all I have to say except for, "Valentina Kerman for President y'all!"

(Drops mic)

Hello shadragon and welcome to the KSP Forums!

I see you're well on your way and paying your dues in skid marks.  Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Greetings alien.  What is a president and why whould we give Val to it?

PS: Did the airforce not teach you to avoid runways at all costs?  Everyone can see you there ^^

9 hours ago, shadragon said:

I'm former Air Force, former game designer, former IT management and current author

Welcome from former Army... 

You're an author? Then I invite you to check out the fan works section. There are a lot of really good fan fiction projects there, and a thread for writers to discuss writing if you'd be interested in sharing some of your experience.

An author? I have a cool idea for a story... It's based on my real life. Except I'd have a better job and a devoted girlfriend.

Also I'm taller in the story.

Anyway, welcome to the forum!

Edited August 30, 2016 by SorryDave

Welcome!

One of my grandfathers (Grandma widowed twice, married thrice) was the ball turret guy on B-36s.
